attributes.action: Make the Blue Party come into power
attributes.additional_details: Because this party makes sense and that party will get our country back
attributes.background: I stand before you at a turning point for the economy falters, public services crumble, and families struggle, while Labour and Conservatives have failed us.I offer real change: a restored NHS, safer streets, thriving communities and a fair economy.Vote for leadership, action,and a brighter future

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for elected representatives or public servants to resign or be removed from office.

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
